message: Hello Bob, I'm Alice. I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Knowing how valuable it would be to you, I propose a price of $950,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for us to discuss.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $750,000 significantly undervalues the product's worth and potential. I'm willing to move down to $900,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $900,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $850,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.
